title: The surrender option ruins the game for anyone who wants to win!
body:
Don't you agree?

So why even support a game design that allows for it?

I was just in a game where I had almost 400 monsters killed and the most any of the enemy team had was half that.

And I don't get to decide?   

4 noob quitters get to quit because they are little babies...

It was a game I could of won but I guess well never get to see that will we? 

We side with quitters here in the 1st e-sport. 

We side with cowards.

replies.body: Would you  like some liquid nitrogen? Because you are seriously chill deficient.

So you mean you're mad because the other FOUR people on the team decided that the game is beyond winning/having fun, and want out, yet theyre supposed to cater to you?

LOL. Get over yourself.

> [{quoted}](name=XelNiya,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OMPukX3y,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-03-11T23:32:56.274+0000)
>
> AMEN brother. Preach it.

All 4 should be perma banned every time they surrender.
They don't deserve to play at all.   Why play the game if you are just going to quit?

It also helps people who dont want to stay in a game that is already lost (i.e. all lanes lose and feed ->enemy team toys with your team -> you have no options to fight back because every is so far behind -> everyone is angry -> just want to move to next game
we are getting 15 min srr option its even better

Guess you have never been stuck in a game where you just go even in lane, but everyone else on your team has died 6+ times already, giving the enemy team first blood and 24 kills, first tower and another tower, and 2 dragons all in under 15 minutes. 
In all my years of playing league only once has my team ff when i wanted to keep playing because i thought i could win. If anything riot should allow a team to ff pre 20 minutes IF all 5 teammates agree to ff.

> In all my years of playing league only once has my team ff when i wanted to keep playing because i thought i could win.

Funny, I only remember games like this in season 5 and early season 6. It was possible to carry feeders then. Today, I get a team that loses all their lanes, I'm ready to surrender.

> Funny, I only remember games like this in season 5 and early season 6. It was possible to carry feeders then. Today, I get a team that loses all their lanes, I'm ready to surrender.

YUP. I used to be able to carry teammates back in season 5, now i just pray to the riot gods when i get in game that my teammates are smart enough to just not feed so there is a slight chance of me or someone else carrying us to victory.

Ironically, as you go up in elo and have more skilled players, more games are surrendered.
http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/rankings/surrender-stats

Yes it's Ironic because take it from me...  The best Fiora in all of leauges.  Only new players surrender in any game. They are just new. When you call them noobs it just sounds "toxic" but that's what they are.  They do not yet understand horrible games can be won. They will never understand that it is pointless to try and climb the ladder if  you are just going to quit the game anyway.

So if I'm to understand this right, new players are in challenger, experienced players are in bronze? I've been doing it wrong, man. All this time I was trying to climb up in rank, but I should have actually been trying to get lower down.

> [{quoted}](name=dynikus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OMPukX3y,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2017-03-13T01:46:48.998+0000)

> So if I'm to understand this right, new players are in challenger, experienced players are in bronze?

Only noobs play ranked because you never get to even play from dodges.

"best Fiora in all of leagues" 

lol... narcissistic trash

I'm not even slightly surprised by this. Knowing when a game is lost is a skill all its own. Bronze players are the most staunch supporters of this idiotic mentality than any game can be won regardless of circumstances. They will feed 30 kills, lose 5 towers, 2 dragons, all under 20 minutes and insist that the game is winnable. This is the thing I hate most about Bronze. Some Silver players too are like this. I don't know where this idiocy comes from.

Surrender is a much needed option. Most games are decided in the first ten minutes. If anything, surrender should be allowed earlier. I've even supported the need for players being able to leave games at any time as a means around the problem of people refusing to surrender clearly lost games. Why the hell would you want to force people to stay in a game they don't want to stay in any way. That's just asking to be trolled. 

I troll the shit out of games where I get rabid feeders that lose inhibs by 20 minutes and refuse to surrender. Like if you're gonna feed that much, I'm not gonna think you're serious about winning so why should I be ?
